searchStringsArray.description: Array containing the search terms you'd use on Google Maps. Each term requires equal processing time. Use unique terms for efficiency.

locationQuery.description: Text location definition. Use with country name if providing Zip codes. Can also use geolocation fields for more specific location input.

maxCrawledPlacesPerSearch.description: Maximum number of results for each search term. Higher values result in longer scrape times.

language.description: Language in which result details will be shown.

onlyDataFromSearchPage.description: If true, only data from the Google Maps search page will be scraped, speeding up the process.

includeWebResults.description: If true, it will extract the bottom 'Web results' section of place data.

deeperCityScrape.description: If enabled, extracts more places from larger areas by focusing on individual cities inside the region.

oneReviewPerRow.description: If true, each review gets its own row in the results. Useful for CSV-friendly results.

reviewsSort.description: Defines the order in which reviews should be sorted.

reviewsFilterString.description: Keyword filter for reviews. Only reviews containing the keyword(s) will be scraped.

scrapeReviewerName.description: If true, the reviewer's name will be extracted.

scrapeReviewerId.description: If true, the reviewer's ID will be extracted.

scrapeReviewerUrl.description: If true, the reviewer's URL will be extracted.

scrapeReviewId.description: If true, the review's ID will be extracted.

scrapeReviewUrl.description: If true, the review's URL will be extracted.

scrapeResponseFromOwnerText.description: If true, any responses from the business owner to reviews will be extracted.

searchMatching.description: Restrict what places are scraped based on title matching with provided search term.

skipClosedPlaces.description: If true, skips places that are marked as closed.

maxImages.description: Maximum number of images per place. Set to '0' or leave empty for no images. For all images, use '99999'.

zoom.description: Sets the zoom level. It's usually auto-selected based on the location. Manual change may cause cost variation.

countryCode.description: Set the country for the search. If used without other geolocation parameters, it scans the whole country.

city.description: Set the city for the search. Only use one city name without state or country.

state.description: Set the state for the search, mainly for US addresses.

county.description: Set the US county for the search.

postalCode.description: Set the postal code of the search area, combined with country. Only one postal code at a time.

customGeolocation.description: Define exact search area using coordinates in [longitude, latitude] format.

placeMinimumStars.description: Only scrape places with a minimum rating. Places without reviews are skipped. Limiting reviews can lower places found per credits spent.

startUrls.description: Provide a Google Maps URL for search. Use either /maps/search or /maps/place in URL.

allPlacesNoSearchAction.description: Scrape all visible places on the map based on zoom level.
